text: The Mustelinae is a large subfamily of mustelids. Genetic analysis shows it is polyphyletic, so it will probably be split down into proper clades. Until then, it contains: *Weasels *Ferrets *Minks *Wolverines *Martens *Badgers *Polecats *Stoats and various other mustelids. == References == Category:Mustelids
title: Mustelinae
